about.title: About me
about.content: I'm 20 years old and I'm completing my degree in Technology in Internet Systems. Currently working as a Junior Developer at Proesc, with experience in customer service (chat/ticket), agile methodologies, code maintenance, problem solving and new features :)
about.content2: I have experience with HTML, CSS, PHP, Laravel, Postgresql and Javascript. I try to study frameworks like ReactJs, React Native, Nextjs and I love participating in open-source events and communities like Hacktoberfest. In my free time I like to watch TV Shows, sports, play video games and read!

projects.title: Projects
projects.project2: Indicators for Support Metrics, powered by Zendesk API.
